script.lang: update amp_funding set type_of_assistance_category_va = NULL where type_of_assistance_category_va = (select id from amp_category_value where category_value = 'Grant Element' and amp_category_class_id =(select id from amp_category_class where keyname = 'type_of_assistence')); delete from amp_category_value where category_value = 'Grant Element' and amp_category_class_id =(select id from amp_category_class where keyname = 'type_of_assistence');
